attributes.action: GET TIME WALK AND DISCOVERY BACK IN BREWERS QUAY
attributes.additional_details: Bring it back to how it was and the community I'm sure will help put it back together again.
attributes.background: For years the time walk and discovery have been good for people of all ages, an indoor attraction. People learnt of our history and it was great to see all of what Weymouth was about. I grew up with this and was sad to see it go for no reason. Let's bring it back and I need your help in doing it .
